security.paillier

Class PaillierCipher

  • Object
    • CipherSpi
      • PaillierCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CipherConstants

    public final class PaillierCipher
extends CipherSpi
implements CipherConstants
    Author:
    Andrew Quijano This class contains the Paillier cipher that supports Paillier operations on BigIntegers. As it extends from CipherSpi, it can also encrypt byte arrays as well.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface CipherConstants

        BILLION, CERTAINTY, EIGHT, FIELD_SIZE, FIVE, FOUR, NEG_ONE, SEVEN, THREE, TWO

      • encrypt

        public static BigInteger encrypt(BigInteger plaintext,
                                 PaillierPublicKey pk)
                          throws HomomorphicException
        Encrypt with PaillierPublicKey Compute ciphertext = g^{m}r^{n} (mod n^2)
        Parameters:
        plaintext -
        pk -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If the plaintext is larger than the plaintext supported by Paillier Public Key, an exception will be thrown

                                 PaillierPrivateKey sk)
                          throws HomomorphicException
        Compute plaintext = L(c^(lambda) mod n^2) * rho mod n
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - - Paillier ciphertext
        sk - - used to decrypt ciphertext
        Returns:
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If the ciphertext is larger than N^2, an exception will be thrown

      • add

        public static BigInteger add(BigInteger ciphertext1,
                             BigInteger ciphertext2,
                             PaillierPublicKey pk)
                      throws HomomorphicException
        returns the sum of the Paillier encrypted values Note: The result is still encrypted Warning: If the sum exceeds N, it is subject to N
        Parameters:
        ciphertext1 - - Encrypted Paillier value
        ciphertext2 - - Encrypted Paillier value
        pk - - used to encrypt both ciphertexts
        Returns:
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If either ciphertext is greater than N or negative, throw an exception

      • add_plaintext

        public static BigInteger add_plaintext(BigInteger ciphertext,
                                       BigInteger plaintext,
                                       PaillierPublicKey pk)
                                throws HomomorphicException
        returns the sum of the Paillier encrypted value and plaintext value Warning: If the sum exceeds N, it is subject to mod N
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - - Paillier encrypted value
        plaintext -
        pk - - was used to encrypt ciphertext
        Returns:
        Encrypted sum of ciphertext and plaintext
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If a ciphertext is negative or exceeds N^2 or plaintext is negative or exceeds N

      • divide

        public static BigInteger divide(BigInteger ciphertext,
                                BigInteger divisor,
                                PaillierPublicKey pk)
                         throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the division of the Paillier cipher-text and a plaintext. Warning: Divide will only work correctly on perfect divisor like 2|20, it will work. If you try 3|20, it will NOT work and you will get a wrong answer! If you want to do 3|20, you MUST use a division protocol from Veugen paper
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - - Paillier ciphertext
        divisor - - plaintext value
        pk - - was used to encrypt ciphertext
        Returns:
        Encrypted Paillier value equal to ciphertext/plaintext
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException

      • divide

        public static BigInteger divide(BigInteger ciphertext,
                                long divisor,
                                PaillierPublicKey pk)
                         throws HomomorphicException
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException

                      throws HomomorphicException

        Parameters:

        pk - - PaillierPublicKey used to encrypt all the values

                      throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the sum of the encrypted Paillier values
        Parameters:
        values - - Array of Encrypted Paillier values
        pk - - PaillierPublicKey used to encrypted the values
        limit - - Sum values up to this index value in the list
        Returns:
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException

      • sum

        public static BigInteger sum(List<BigInteger> values,
                             PaillierPublicKey pk)
                      throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the encrypted sum of the list of all Paillier values
        Parameters:
        values - - List of Paillier encrypted values by PaillierPublicKey pk
        pk - - PaillierPublicKey used to encrypt every element in values list.
        Returns:
        Encrypted Paillier sum
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException

      • sum

        public static BigInteger sum(List<BigInteger> values,
                             PaillierPublicKey pk,
                             int limit)
                      throws HomomorphicException
        Note: Compute the sum of all values in the list of Paillier Encrypted values.
        Parameters:
        values - - List of Encrypted Paillier values
        pk - - PaillierPublicKey used to encrypt the list of values
        limit - - maximum index to sum up to in the area
        Returns:
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException

      • sum_product

        public static BigInteger sum_product(List<BigInteger> ciphertext,
                                     List<Long> plaintext,
                                     PaillierPublicKey pk)
                              throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the sum-product. It computes the scalar multiplication between the array of Encrypted and plaintext values. Then it computes the encrypted sum.
        Parameters:
        pk - - Paillier Public Key used to encrypt list of ciphertext
        cipher - - List of ciphertext
        plain - - List of plaintext
        Returns:
        Encrypted sum product
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - If the lists of encrypted values and plaintext values are not equal

      • sum_product

        public static BigInteger sum_product(BigInteger[] ciphertext,
                                     Long[] plaintext,
                                     PaillierPublicKey pk)
                              throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the sum-product. It computes the scalar multiplication between the array of Encrypted and plaintext values. Then it computes the encrypted sum.
        Parameters:
        cipher - - Array of Encrypted Paillier values
        plain - - Array of plaintext values
        pk - - Paillier Public Key used to encrypt values in cipher-text list
        Returns:
        Encrypted sum-product
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If the size of plaintext array and ciphertext array isn't equal
